import{api}from'./api';export const userAPI={getCurrentUser:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/users/me');return response.data;},updateProfile:async data=>{const response=await api.put('/users/me',data);return response.data;},// --- Admin Functions ---
getAllUsers:async(page,limit)=>{const response=await api.get('/users',{params:{page,limit}});return response.data;},updateUser:async(userId,data)=>{const response=await api.patch(`/users/${userId}`,data);return response.data;}};
